title: Buy here now: Oasis to open series of merch stores before reunion gigs
description: Exclusive: first store opens in Spinningfields, Manchester, two weeks before band‚Äôs first gig in 16 years in CardiffWill the truce between the Gallagher brothers hold out? Will the most-hyped reunion in British rock history actually come off? And will fans be able to bag themselves an official Oasis tea towel?The answer to that final question, at least, has arrived. The first Oasis merchandise store will open in Manchester on Friday, two weeks before the band perform their first gig in 16 years at the Principality Stadium in Cardiff. Continue reading...

title: What‚Äôs behind the return of mini-me dressing?
description: As more parents dress like their kids ‚Äì and more children dress like grownups ‚Äì some are asking if our offspring have become style inspirations ‚Ä¶ or even accessoriesThe Princess of Wales and her 10-year-old daughter, Princess Charlotte, seemed to have shared not just a carriage but also outfit notes at trooping the colour last weekend, since they were both wearing neighbouring blues on the colour wheel. They do it a lot, this so-called ‚Äúmini-me dressing‚Äù ‚Äì via tartans and tiaras, nautical details and nifty colour accents.She‚Äôs not the only one. Kim Kardashian does it with her kids, Beyonc√© does it with Blue Ivy. In fact, it tallies with the whole vibe of nepo babies, who are now appearing in the public eye wearing outfits that are sartorial embodiments of the relationships that will privilege them for life. Continue reading...

title: 4 Editors Try Reformation's Swimwear - Here's What We Think
description: It may come as no surprise that Reformation's swimwear comes with new and improved materials. The line, which retails from $68 to $168 in sizes XS-XL, is made from a renewable and bio-based fiber called EVO by Fulgar. And, according to Reformation's chief innovation officer Alison Melville, the product will only grow more sustainable with each seasonal drop (check out their most recent drop here!). The first range incorporated deadstock fabric from the brand's debut swimwear collection in 2019, and Reformation promises to "continue innovating and trying out new materials until we create the most sustainable swimwear possible," according to Melville. Instantly attracted to the striking bikinis and one-pieces, PS editors were eager to get our hands on the swimwear designs, many of which were influenced by bestselling products across other categories. "We designed Ref Swim to complement and round out our customers' existing Ref wardrobes," Melville tells PS. "Throughout the design process, we were inspired by the concept of outfitting and looked to the silhouettes of some of our top performing apparel items to create complementary swim pieces." For example, the Bryson Dress is one of their most popular styles in 2025 so they carried the vibrant red color and the sweetheart neckline detail through in the Soleil Bikini Top. Melville confirms that the success of the drops has exceeded expectations, with solid colors being most popular - a trend that speaks to the Ref shopper's love for '90s minimalism. The Tossa Top (now out of stock), Azure Bottom, and Soleil Top were within the top five SKUs at the original time of publishing this story, and they just so happen to be three of the pieces we selected to try at PS. Ahead, you'll hear from four different editors about their experiences trying Reformation swimwear with one shared sentiment: the quality is in the fabric and the fit. Plus, we've added a couple more styles for you to shop from. Update on June 18, 2025 at 2:00 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. @ps.feelgood Reformation's revamped swimwear might be giving the brand's dresses a run for their money, and we're here for it! The swimwear comes with new and improved sustainable materials. These four editors give a more in-depth review at our üîó in bio. #Reformation #Swimwear #Summer ‚ô¨ original sound - Popsugar
author: Sarah Wasilak

title: 19 Early Prime Day Fashion Deals, Including Kendall Jenner's $9 Tank
description: Fashion connoisseurs, rejoice. Amazon Prime Day might be two weeks away, but the deals have already started. Ahead of the sale's July 8 live date, shoppers can take advantage of some of the year's biggest deals - including markdowns on bestselling styles like handbags, leggings, everyday sneakers, and more. As shopping experts, we're essentially always tuned into Amazon's best deals and markdowns - from savings on cult-favorite beauty products to price drops on Amazon's most coveted home essentials and discounts on top-rated wellness products. And of course, we curated a guide to the best Prime Day fashion to help you better sort through these deals. FYI: these fashion deals are going fast, so you'll want to keep your credit card handy and act quickly. Our Favorite Early Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop Kendall Jenner's favorite tank top: Hanes Ecosmart Cotton Tank at $9, originally $11 The pajama sets of all pajama sets: Eberjey Gisele Rib Relaxed Short PJ Set at $104, originally $148 A versatile summer dress: Amazon The Drop Kimi Ruffled-Shoulder Smocked Midi Dress at $35, originally $70 The affordable leggings to motivate you to work out: Satina High Waisted Leggings at $15, originally $18 Keep scrolling to shop our top Prime Day sale picks, and be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the action. Looking for more deals? Check out PS's editor-curated Prime Day sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on June 18, 2025 at 1:30 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.
author: Kyley Warren

title: Where To Shop For Sunglasses, From Polarized Lenses To Sport Frames
description: Your eyes are precious, so it‚Äôs important to keep ‚Äòem as healthy and stylish as possible. On those supremely bright and sunny days, that means putting on a pair of trendy sunglasses to protect your delicate pupils from harmful UV rays, glare, dust ‚Äî or paparazzi flashes when out with your digital camera friend.We know that the world of shaded eyewear can be overwhelming, with sunglasses coming in all sorts of shapes, sizes, and widths. That‚Äôs why we put together this mini guide to the best sunglasses to look out for, categorized by style, lens type, and activity ‚Äî and with options for every budget.¬†Whether you're looking for a pair of statement sunglasses for your next vacation, prescription glasses to give your eyes a rest from contacts, or colorful frames to match your wardrobe, there are plenty of options out there. We've even got you covered with polarized styles, sporty shades, and designs for wider faces. So, if one style doesn‚Äôt work for you, we guarantee there‚Äôs another pair of sunnies around the corner that will. Now, go forth and keep those rays at bay.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.The Best Brands For Prescription SunglassesAs any glasses-wearer will know, shopping for a new pair of prescription sunglasses is a major decision. Not only are you committing to a pair of frames if and until your prescription changes, but it‚Äôs a choice that will cost you a pretty penny. This is why we‚Äôre such fans of Pair Eyewear, a brand all about choice and customization at affordable prices. You can choose from a variety of prescription frames ‚Äî prices starting at $60 ‚Äî and select from hundreds of customizable ‚Äútops‚Äù; aka magnetic, flat frames that cover the front of your glasses to instantly change their appearance. This means that using the same stylish frame as a base, you can switch seamlessly between eyeglasses and sunglasses, or between different colored and patterned options ‚Äî ideal for matching your specs to your outfit! (There are also plenty of sunglasses-only options available, too.)If you have a higher budget, there are several other luxury brands always on our rotation: Ace & Tate, Warby Parker, and Cubitts offer chic, stylish frames within the¬†$200 to $300 price range.Pair Eyewear The Payton, $, available at Pair EyewearWarby Parker Lupin, $, available at Warby ParkerCubitts Grimaldi, $, available at Cubittsace & tate Selma, $, available at ace & tateThe Best Brands For Polarized SunglassHeard of polarized sunglasses but are not sure of their benefits? Polarized shades are especially crucial if you're an outdoorsy, under-the-sun person. These sunglasses reduce that intense glare that usually appears on ocean water or crisp snow, making it much easier for you to see things in nature as they really are.Polaroid 52mm Polarized Round Sunglasses, $, available at NordstromNectar Woodstock, $, available at NectarPrada PR 22ZS, $, available at Sunglasses HutMaui Jim Honi, $, available at Maui JimThe Best Brands For Wide-Width SunglassesIncreasingly, more eyewear designers are taking note of face shapes and sizes, and specifying their styles as "wide" or "XL." The glasses ahead are all from eyewear brands that offer wider fits ‚Äî which means no more indents on your temples.Messy Weekend Grace, $, available at Messy WeekendEye Buy Direct Draft Cat EyeClear Yellow Sunglasses, $, available at Eye Buy DirectKnockaround Matte Black/Smoke Fort Knocks, $, available at KnockaroundSunski Shoreline Olive Amber, $, available at SunskiThe Best Brands For Statement SunglassesWhen all else fails in the sartorial department, you can always count on statement sunglasses to elevate your look. Don't be afraid of being extra extra ‚Äî this is your moment to go big and bold, playing with exaggerated sizes, interesting shapes, and vibrant colors.Free People Cloud 9 Sunglasses, $, available at Free PeopleJimmy Fairly The Lily, $, available at Jimmy FairlyVivienne Westwood Soo Sunglasses, $, available at Vivienne WestwoodEyeking Double-Lens Sunglasses, $, available at AnthropologieThe Best Brands For Tinted Lens SunglassesWant to literally see the world through rose-colored glasses ‚Äî or maybe yellow, orange, or blue? You‚Äôre in luck, bright colors are dominating the runways this year, so a pair of vibrant lenses are at the top of our most wanted list.Gucci Rectangle-Frame Metal Sunglasses, $, available at SelfridgesMeller Nayah, $, available at MellerFree People Dara Oversized Square Sunglasses, $, available at Free PeopleFendi First Oval Sunglasses, $, available at mytheresaThe Best Brands For Sport SunglassesWhether you're an adventurer or just like looking the part, secure a pair of athlete-approved sunglasses that stay put during your summer exercises and activities. The polarized lenses are water- and oil-resistant, the frames are feather-light, and the grippy nose pads prevent droop, even when the sweat is pourin'.Blenders Eyewear Eclipse, $, available at Blenders EyewearNike Veil Sunglasses, $, available at NikeSmith Parallel 2 Polarized Sunglasses, $, available at REIAlo Yoga Stunner Sunglasses, $, available at Alo YogaLike what you see? author: Esther Newman

title: 39 Summer Fashion Finds From Nordstrom‚Äôs Sale Section
description: Summer dressing hits different ‚Äî breezy dresses, crisp white tops, and nautical-inspired staples from poplin button-downs to boat shoes (√† la the trending fisherman aesthetic), are simply everything. Add in this season‚Äôs sandal lineup (Flip-flops! Slides! Kitten heels!) and a color palette spanning butter yellow to powder pink ‚Äî plus cheery prints like polka dots and stripes ‚Äî and it‚Äôs officially time to refresh the rotation.Luckily, Nordstrom‚Äôs sale section is here, with up to 75% off, just in time to revamp your summer wardrobe. As a fashion editor, I‚Äôm always combing through it for the best finds ‚Äî timeless staples, trend-forward styles, and everything in between. Right now, I‚Äôm stocking up on the kind of pieces that make summer dressing feel easy: cute dress-and-sneaker combos, playful bubble hems, airy raffia accessories, fun sunglasses, and standout swim. And yes, I‚Äôm still making room for loungewear ‚Äî just the kind that can handle a heat wave and feel perfectly effortless during summer travel. Plus summer wedding guest dresses, breezy matching sets, and Cowboy Cartner-ready extras.¬†¬†Click through for 39 of the best summer-ready finds from Nordstrom‚Äôs sale section ‚Äî all editor-approved and all worth scooping up before they‚Äôre gone.All linked products are independently selected by our editors.
